item.description:
Boston Red Sox vs. Oakland A's Pre-game Party
Hosted by Ace Ticket!
 
Tuesday, 8/16, 5 pm - 7pm: $85 per person
or
Friday 8/26 5pm - 7pm: $95 per person
 
Get your ticket now for these first ever, EXCLUSIVE parties at GAME ON Sports Bar
at 82 Landsdowne Street
 
Packages Include:
VIP ACCESS AT GAME ON!!
2  Hours of open bar (beer/wine)
2 Hours of all-you-can-eat buffet
AND your ticket to the game!!
We will accommodate groups of any size.
All seats will be together in the Bleachers
Upgrades to better seats are available for an additional cost.
Call Liz at 617-783-3333 or (cell) 505-948-7046
Email: Lizaceticket@gmail.com
 
--

Liz Chavez
Event Specialist
Ace Ticket
O: 617.783.3333
C: 505.948.7046
lchavez@aceticket.com
View my profile on LinkedIn!
 
Join us on facebook!
www.aceticket.com
item.how_to_find_us: Call Liz at 617-783-3333 or 505-948-7046 if you are interested. You can also email me at: Lizaceticket@gmail.com
item.name: Boston Red Sox vs. Oakland A's Pre-game Party Package (includes game-ticket)
